contentrichtext.text: '''Revolutionary Workers League''' may refer to: *[[Revolutionary Workers League/Ligue Ouvrière Révolutionnaire]], a Canadian Trotskyist group *[[Revolutionary Workers League (New Zealand)]] *[[Revolutionary Workers League (Oehlerite)]], an U.S. group that existed in the 1930s, founded by [[Hugo Oehler]] *[[Revolutionary Workers League (U.S., 1976)]], a U.S. [[Trotskyism|Trotskyist]] group founded in 1976 *[[Revolutionary Workers League (Britain)]], a British group in the late 1930s ==See also== *[[Workers Revolutionary League]] {{disambig}} [[Category:Political party disambiguation pages]]
